plot: A bus driver, Mark drives his assigned bus, 140 as usual. His routine life has not changed for a long time: He drives the same bus, with the same time schedule, on the same route, everyday....
title: Routine
plot_es: A bus driver, Mark drives his assigned bus, 140 as usual. His routine life has not changed for a long time: He drives the same bus, with the same time schedule, on the same route, everyday....
